= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a banquet meal or feast with honored guests
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= man; ► king of Babylon (בָּבֶל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: tasting; hence: = action by which humans ingest food or drink, enjoy the flavor, and undergo the effects it might have

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness
= to take something or someone to a certain location, seen from that locations's perspective
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= man; ◄ son of Nabopolassar; ► king of Babylon (בָּבֶל) from 605 562 B.C. who led the people of Judah (יְהוּדָה) into exile
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= wife of a king
= a woman who lives with a man but has lower status than his wife or wives

= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

= the hard substance that makes up most of a tree ► carved or cut and assembled into objects

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; ≈ associated with mortality

= semi liquid material that hardens when it dries; ► used on walls to create a smooth surface
= flat vertical construction, ◄ made of stone, sometimes with wooden supports, ► used as a divider of spaces, or to enclose a space

= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= animal; ◄ generic, sometimes referring to all animals, sometimes limited to wild land animals only

= the place where a person or deity resides
= large ruminant animal with horns and cloven hoofs, ► domesticated primarily for meat or milk, as a beast of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; a clean animal which can be eaten and sacrificed
= causative action by which humans give animals food to eat
= condensed moisture resulting from contact of air and cooler land surfaces; ►an important source of water for vegetation; ≈ regarded as refreshing, life enhancing; associated with fertility

= the physical body of humans and animals, not including the mind and the inner person
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

literally: to raise oneself up; hence: = action by which humans refuse to accept someone else's authority

= the hard substance that makes up most of a tree ► carved or cut and assembled into objects

= process by which someone perceives an important object with the eyes, or witnesses an event of some significance

= action by which humans express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to deities about who they are and what they do
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= referent pointing to a point in time, usually in reference to another event
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= slightly curved concave area of the human hand, between the fingers and the wrist
= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body
= a written document, written on an unspecified surface
= action by which letters or words or other symbols are inscribed on a surface, such as stone or papyrus, with a pointed stylus or reed
= a written document, written on an unspecified surface
= action by which letters or words or other symbols are inscribed on a surface, such as stone or papyrus, with a pointed stylus or reed
literally: division; hence: = half or a shekel (תְּקֵל) or mina (מְנֵא)
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= contraption consisting of rod held by a cord in the middle and with pans attached to both ends; ► used for weighing objects; sometimes used figuratively in expressions describing people's status or integrity or the seriousness of a situation in terms of weight
literally: lacking; hence: = state in which humans are lacking certain important qualities
literally: division; hence: = half or a shekel (תְּקֵל) or mina (מְנֵא)

Node.gloss: to grant help|to give aid|to help
Node.definition: literally: to give; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to receive a quality, a position, or support
= a nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by Madai; the empire was consolidated in the 6th 5th and stretched from Mesopotamia to Turkey
= a nation and its territory, which was greatly expanded during the reign of Cyrus (כֹּורֶשׁ) I.
= referent pointing to a point in time, usually in reference to another event

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ► king of Babylon (בָּבֶל)
= causative action by which humans help other humans to put on clothes
= man, also known as Belteshazzar; ► main character of the book of Daniel; possibly to be identified with one of three righteous men mentioned in Ezekiel
= woven material, dyed reddish purple with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish
= object made by a craftsman; ◄ usually made out of precious metal; ► worn around the neck as decoration or as symbol of authority
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= part of the body connecting the rump to the head; ► a place to wear ornaments
= action by which humans make proclamations on behalf of a king or leader
= part of the basic unit of time characterized by darkness, in contrast with the other part, characterized by light; is itself marked up by different parts
= man; ► king of Babylon (בָּבֶל)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= descendant of Chesed (כֶּשֶׂד) son of Nahor (נָחֹור) and their land
